titleStmt.title: Another sermon preached to the Honorable House of Commons now assembled in Parliament, November the fifth, 1641 by Cornelius Burges, D.D. ; wherein, among other things, are shewed a list of some of the popish traytors in England.
titleStmt.author: Burges, Cornelius, 1589?-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.B. for P. Stephens and C. Meridith ...,
